questions.qtext: What challenges are you facing?
What matters to you right now?
What’s on your mind today?
What opportunities are you seeing?
What else?
What is the best possible outcome?
What are you trying to achieve?
What do you want to happen next?
What does success look like?
How will you know if you’ve succeeded?
What have you tried?
What options do you have?
How possible is each option?
What would you have to believe for this option to be right?
What data/information do you need to make a decision?
What action can you take now?
What are you taking away from this conversation, as a next step or new way of thinking?
What support do you need? Where will you get it?
How can I help?
From your perspective, how do you feel our collaboration is going?
Could you give me an honest assessment of our work together?
Is there anything that you'd change about our relationship?
What should I be doing more of or less of?
Are there individuals in the organization with whom I need to spend more time?
Is there sufficient communication so far?
Am I doing an effective job at linking our work to your key priorities?
What have I done that has been most helpful to you?
In what ways am I helping you to achieve your goals?
Do you feel I am working on the most central and critical issues for you?
How can I make your life easier?
How could I make doing business with me easier?
In what ways could I be a better listener to you and your organization?
Are there any aspects of your business or parts of your organization that you think I should understand better?
Overall, how can I do a better job of helping you to meet your own objectives?
Are there any other issues that we ought to be aware of or thinking about for you?
Do you have any other concerns that you'd like to put on the table?
On a scale of 1 to 10, how enthusiastically would you recommend me and my firm to a friend or colleague?
